data: Only at one point along the straight earth-road leading from Loo-chow to Yu-ping was there any shade, a wood of stunted growth, and here Kai Lung cast himself down in refuge from the noontide sun and slept.
Bramah, Ernest, 1869?-1942; Belloc, Hilaire, 1870-1953 [Author of introduction, etc.]
